DOC.brief_summary: Objectives : To know main therapeutic strategy use men spinal cord injury sexual dysfunction .
DOC.detailed_description: Methods : This descriptive observational study involve 24 men mean age 32.62 ( CI 28.65 36.60 ) , spinal cord injury , recruit reference service spinal cord injury Recife ( PE ) . The subject underwent neurological evaluation accordance guideline International Standards Neurological Examination Functional classification Spinal Cord Injury ( ISNCSCI ) , American Spinal Injury Association ( ASIA ) , assessment sexual function Erectile Function International Index ( IIEF ) answer semi-structured form identify therapeutic strategy use sexual function . To collect information medicinal plant , search make surroundings public market locate Metropolitan Region Recife ( PE ) .
DOC.criteria: clinical diagnosis traumatic spinal cord injury injury time le six month heterosexual sexually active patient erectile dysfunction attribute endocrine metabolic disease order underwent surgery genital area , radical prostatectomy penile implant cognitive impairment
